page.title: 04Population Movement
page.content: There is an old lady who lives at Four Acres,Lower Weald, Calverton.She has lived there for 34 years. She is a widow of 75 years of age and her family have grown up and left home. She has decided to sell her house because she finds it too difficult to cope with the large garden and the house.She is moving to an old peoples bungalow in Newport Pagnell. There is a newcomer to the village she lives in Middle Weald Calverton.She moved into her cottage 6 months ago. She use to live in Newport Pagnell a busy town with a lot of traffic and noise.She wanted to live in the country because it is quiet and peaceful and where there was open space for her to walk her dog and fresh air for her twin daughters.
